summary: This is a draft meeting agenda for a Human Trafficking meeting at the SDNY on February 15, 2019. It outlines discussion topics including the SDNY's human trafficking program statistics, the role of coordinators, specific issues like the R. Kelly case, and a planned highlight of the Epstein case.

persons.name: R. Kelly
persons.context: Mentioned under 'Issues' as a case presenting potential conflicts for the office.

persons.name: E stein
persons.context: Listed under 'Case Highlights' on the agenda, referring to the Jeffrey Epstein case.

connections.description: Both are participants/presenters in the same SDNY Human Trafficking meeting, collaborating on the agenda.
AK is a Human Trafficking Coordinator who is scheduled to present the Epstein case as a highlight during the meeting.

events.title: SDNY Human Trafficking Meeting
events.description: A scheduled meeting at the Southern District of New York to discuss the office's human trafficking program, case issues, and highlights including the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The SDNY's Human Trafficking Program was actively handling approximately 50 investigations and 10-15 charged cases at the time.
The agenda specifically lists the 'R. Kelly' case as an 'Issue' under conflicts, indicating it was an active concern for the office.
The Epstein case ('E stein') was listed as a planned 'Case Highlight' for discussion at this high-level prosecutorial meeting in February 2019.
The document shows internal SDNY coordination and planning regarding human trafficking cases just months before Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
